name: Color Swatch (Tomato Owl)
description:
Color swatch is a color puzzle game, where the player aligns the colors in the order of the swatch to complete the level.

There are 48 levels to play. 

For those who love color based and challenging puzzle. 

Its free to play in iOS and andriod devices please find the link below. 

Made with buildbox. Appreciate the support and feedback.
